DOC.brief_title: Multivariate Assessment IUB Intrauterine Device Compared With T380A IUD
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Adult female age 2542 Free willing fully comply treatment process Healthy woman seek LARC Married steady relationship ( least 1 year ) Blood hemoglobin > 11.5gr % Signed informed consent form If take COCP least one cycle use OC Exclusion criterion : Use IUB/IUD emergency contraception A previously place IUD remove Pregnancy suspicion pregnancy Use contraception method ( condom either male female , oral contraceptive , diaphragm , spermicide , hormonal patch , injection ring , cervical cap ) History pelvic inflammatory disease , recent remote . Postpartum endometritis postabortal endometritis past 3 month Mucupurulent cervicitis Endometrial thickness 12 mm insertion date Known anemia ( except thalassemia , sickle cell , chronic anemia ) History previous IUD complication Dysfunctional uterine bleeding Undiagnosed uterine bleeding Malignancy suspect malignant disease female inner outer genitalia Distortions uterine cavity uterine fibroid know anatomical abnormality Known intolerance allergy nitinol copper and/or copper IUDs Wilson 's disease . Medication may interfere subject 's ability complete protocol Use injectable contraception previous year Any significant disease condition could interfere subject 's ability complete protocol A history alcohol drug abuse Known infection human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) , Hepatitis B Hepatitis C Pregnancy pregnancy plan year Enrollment ( less 30 day complete another study ) plan enrol another study
